metadata.name: О-90 is crying
metadata.description:
This work was supposed to be part of the play "WE" at the Deutsches Theater (Berlin), directed by Maxim Didenko, based on E. Zamjatin novel "МЫ". But the play was canceled or postponed due to the war launched on Putin's orders against Ukraine.


I will send half of the proceeds from the sale to volunteer organizations helping refugees in Berlin.
No war! Fuck Putin!
